description: Side bet template bank for T20 cricket matches. Admin picks from this bank when configuring match side bets.

templates.question_text: Will a century be scored in this match?
templates.notes: Centuries are rare in T20s. Use higher points for correct.

templates.question_text: Will a half-century (50+) be scored in this match?
templates.notes: Half-centuries are common. Lower points.

templates.question_text: What will be the highest individual score in this match?
templates.notes: Predicting the range of the top scorer.

templates.question_text: How many sixes will be hit in this match?
templates.notes: Average T20I has ~12-15 sixes.

templates.question_text: How many fours will be hit in this match?
templates.notes: Average T20I has ~20-25 fours.

templates.question_text: Will the number of wides be >10 in this match?
templates.notes: Average T20I has 8-12 wides.

templates.question_text: Will the number of wides be >10 in the first 8 overs of the first innings?
templates.notes: Harder to predict for a subset of overs.

templates.question_text: How many total extras will be bowled in this match?
templates.notes: Includes wides, no-balls, byes, leg-byes.

templates.question_text: Who will be the Man of the Match?
templates.notes: Based on batting order position of the MoM.

templates.question_text: Who will give lesser runs in the game (both sides combined)?
templates.notes: Compare total runs conceded by spinners vs pacers across both innings.

templates.question_text: How many runs will be scored in the powerplay of the first innings?
templates.notes: Powerplay = first 6 overs. Average T20I powerplay score is ~45-55.

templates.question_text: How many runs will be scored in the powerplay of the second innings?
templates.notes: Second innings powerplay often differs due to chase dynamics.

templates.question_text: How many runs will be scored in the death overs (16-20) of the first innings?
templates.notes: Death overs = overs 16-20. Average ~60-75 runs.

templates.question_text: How many wickets will fall in the first innings powerplay?
templates.notes: Average 1-2 wickets in T20I powerplay.

templates.question_text: How many total wickets will fall in this match?
templates.notes: Average T20I has ~12-14 wickets.

templates.question_text: Will a hat-trick be taken in this match?
templates.notes: Extremely rare. High reward for correct Yes prediction.

templates.question_text: What will the first innings total be?
templates.notes: Average T20I first innings score is ~155-165.

templates.question_text: Will the winning team win by runs or wickets?
templates.notes: Essentially a 50-50 question.

templates.question_text: Will the match go to the last over (20th over of 2nd innings)?
templates.notes: Close matches often go to the wire.

templates.question_text: How many runs will the first innings opening partnership score?
templates.notes: Average T20I opening partnership is ~25-35.

templates.question_text: What will the highest partnership of the match be?
templates.notes: Average highest partnership in T20I is ~50-60.

templates.question_text: What will the dot ball percentage be in the match?
templates.notes: Average T20I dot ball % is ~35-40%.

templates.question_text: Will DLS method be used in this match?
templates.notes: Rain/weather dependent. Risky with negative wrong points.

templates.question_text: What will happen on the first ball of the match?
templates.notes: Fun opening bet. Dot ball is most common (~40%).

templates.question_text: Which team will score more runs in their respective powerplay?
templates.notes: Options are generic - admin can customize per match with actual team names.
